idea-plugin.name: Jump To Usage
idea-plugin.description: Allows you to jump to usage of an element directly instead of having to go through a popup with Alt+F7. Similar to Resharper, but default key mapping is to Alt+Shift+F7 since Ctrl+Alt+F7 does not work in Linux since it's mapped to switching to virtual console 7.

action.description: Allows you to jump directly to an usage of the memeber.. Just like Resharper :)
